snippet: An Iranian official said on Monday that dolls modeled on characters from "The Simpsons," including Bart, Homer and the other members of that Fox cartoon clan, were unacceptable displays of foreign culture and would be banned along with other popular...
abstract: An Iranian official said on Monday that dolls modeled on characters from "The Simpsons," including Bart, Homer and the other members of that Fox cartoon clan, were unacceptable displays of foreign culture and would be banned along with other popular Western toys.
lead_paragraph: As we imagine Comic Book Guy might say: worst cultural ban by an Islamic theocracy ever.

headline.main: Won't Somebody Please Think of the Children? 'Simpsons' Toys Banned in Iran
